description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) server configuration for Agentic Substrate v5.4
instructions: This file maps MCP servers to agents. Edit to customize which tools each agent can access.

memory.description: Knowledge graph memory system for persistent context across sessions

context7.installation_note: Enable after installing context7 MCP server

chief-architect.description: Orchestrator needs memory for context and sequential thinking for complex coordination

docs-researcher.description: Researcher needs all documentation sources plus memory of past research

implementation-planner.description: Planner needs memory to reference past decisions and patterns

code-implementer.description: Implementer needs memory for patterns and DeepWiki for accurate APIs

brahma-analyzer.description: Analyzer needs memory to check consistency across artifacts

brahma-investigator.description: Investigator needs memory for past bugs and sequential thinking for root cause analysis

brahma-deployer.description: Deployer needs memory for deployment history and patterns

brahma-monitor.description: Monitor needs memory for baseline metrics and alert patterns

brahma-optimizer.description: Optimizer needs memory for performance baselines and optimization patterns

seo-strategist.description: SEO specialist uses memory for keyword history and audit baselines

business-analyst.description: Business analyst uses memory for requirements history and process maps

content-strategist.description: Content strategist uses memory for brand voice and content calendar

product-strategist.description: Product strategist uses memory for market data and roadmap history

security-auditor.description: Security auditor uses memory for vulnerability history and compliance state

ux-accessibility-reviewer.description: UX reviewer uses memory for accessibility baselines and heuristic scores

research.description: Research workflow needs all documentation sources

planning.description: Planning workflow needs memory of past decisions

implementation.description: Implementation workflow needs patterns and accurate APIs

debugging.description: Debugging workflow needs past issues and deep reasoning

fallback_behavior.description: If MCP server unavailable, agent continues with reduced capabilities
